resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Lt. Brooks nicknamed the plane after the college attended by his wife. It was the fourth of his airplanes using this moniker, hence Smith IV.
resource.chars: Lt. Brooks nicknamed the plane after the college attended by his wife. It was the fourth of his airplanes using this moniker, hence Smith IV.
